article.title: Generals Sound Off for Signal Corps 150th Anniversary
article.author: Rachel Eisenhower
article.abstract: The Signal Corps 150th anniversary celebration continues in style as top officials take to the U.S. Army Signal Regiment's Facebook page to send out special birthday wishes.
article.text:
The Signal Corps 150th anniversary celebration continues in style as top officials take to the U.S. Army Signal Regiment's Facebook page to send out special birthday wishes. Click the links below to see the video messages from:
Lt. Gen. Mark Hertling, USA, deputy commanding general, initial military training, U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command.
Lt. Gen. Eric Schoomaker, USA, U.S. Army surgeon general, U.S. Army Medical Command.
Lt. Gen. Jeffrey Sorenson, USA, chief information officer/G-6, Department of the Army.
Lt. Gen. Joseph Peterson, USA, deputy commanding general, U.S. Army Forces Command.
Lt. Gen. Carroll Pollett, USA, director, Defense Information Systems Agency, and commander, Joint Task Force Global Network Operations.
Lt. Gen.Dennis Via, USA, director, Command, Control, CommunicationsÂ & Computer Systems Directorate (J-6), Joint Staff.
Lt. Gen. Robert Caslen Jr., USA, commander, U.S. Army Combined Arms Center.
Gen. Martin Dempsey, USA, commanding general, U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command.
While you're logged in to Facebook, you can check for more videos and click "like" on the U.S. Army Signal Regiment's page to show your support. Don't forget to also visit SIGNAL Magazine's Facebook page and click "like" to engage.
